thread.title: Welsh politicians pay tribute to the late Lord Howe
thread.title_full: Welsh politicians pay tribute to the late Lord Howe | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Welsh politicians pay tribute to the late Lord Howe
text:
Welsh politicians have paid tribute to former Chancellor Lord Geoffrey Howe who has died of a heart attack aged 88.
Stephen Crabb @scrabbmp Follow Sad news of the death of Geoffrey Howe. Even in his last days in the House of Lords he continued to take a close interest in Welsh affairs
12:49 - 10 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Andrew RT Davies @AndrewRTDavies Follow Sad to learn of the passing of a huge figure in British politics, Lord Geoffrey Howe. A man of standing as Chancellor and Foreign Secretary.
12:45 - 10 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Sat 10 Oct 2015 Read more 5 updates Former Chancellor Lord Geoffrey Howe dies aged 88 Politics Wales
